doc.field: Five letters between Solomon Sherwood Kimball (1806–1890), his parents, Nathan Kimball (1767–1849) and Rachel (Sherwood) Kimball (1772–1852), and his sister, Amanda L. (Kimball) Topping (1811–1872). To request this collection for research, and for fuller details about it, please read its catalog record catalog record, or write to reference@nyhistory.org.

Five letters between Solomon Sherwood Kimball (1806–1890), his parents, Nathan Kimball (1767–1849) and Rachel (Sherwood) Kimball (1772–1852), and his sister, Amanda L. (Kimball) Topping (1811–1872). To request this collection for research, and for fuller details about it, please read its catalog record catalog record, or write to reference@nyhistory.org.
